name: quicktalk-workspace
description: QuickTalk Customer Service System - Hybrid Architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:services
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:services"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:services
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:services
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:services
